sentence.Network_en: In the paper, the spectral characteristics for twenty - eight triterpenoids from medicinal plants of Rubiaceae were summarized.

means.word_mean: 1. widely distributed family of mostly tropical trees and shrubs and herbs; includes coffee and chinchona and gardenia and madder and bedstraws and partridgeberry
